article_text: For some consumers, paying the penalty for not having health insurance as required under the Affordable Care Act is cheaper than paying for health insurance — for now. That’ll change, though.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Obamacare, Obamacare Florida, Affordable Care Act, Affordable Care Act Florida, Obamacare penalty, Affordable care act penalty, monthly healthcare premium, healthcare costs, healthcare spending

That’ll change, though.
For some consumers, paying the penalty for not having health insurance as required under the Affordable Care Act is cheaper than paying for health insurance — for now.
